content.prompt: Which of the following is the most accurate description of a similarity in the ideas of the two authors?

choices.label: Both authors see the Glorious Revolution in England as a more positive development than the French Revolution.
Both authors see the French Revolution as an attempt to change the traditional order.
Both authors see the French Revolution as encouraging the Industrial Revolution.
Both authors see the motivations for the French Revolution as fundamentally conservative.
